member.name: IStorageFolderHandleAccess.Create
member.summary: Creates a handle to a file that is in a storage folder.
member.param: The name of the file that you want to get a handle to.
The action to take on a file that exists or doesn't exist.
The level of access that a handle has on the file.
The requested sharing mode of the handle.
The flags of the file handle.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IStorageFolderHandleAccess
member.summary: Provides access to the operating system handle of a storage folder.
